T02D3601:226b-1: a'arya aushn'i sha bi dza y'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3601:226b-3: 'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3601:226b-4: 'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3601:226b-5: dang por re zhig sngags pas kha bsang ba la
T02D3601:226b-6: sogs pa byas nas stan bde ba la nye bar
T02D3601:226b-7: 'dug ste / tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3601:226b-8: de'i rjes la rang gi snying gar aa yig yongs
T02D3601:226b-9: su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas
T02D3601:226b-10: / de'i steng du bhr'um yig dkar po bltas la
T02D3601:226b-11: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis 'gro
T02D3601:226b-12: ba rnams gsal bar mdzad nas /
T02D3601:226b-13: mdun du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D3601:226b-14: bsams nas mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa la
T02D3601:226b-16: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes so //
T02D3601:226b-17: de nas slar yang rang gi snying gar zla ba
T02D3601:226b-18: la pam yig las skyes pa'i sna tshogs chu skyes
T02D3601:226b-19: bsams nas / de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3601:226b-20: gyi dbus su gnas pa'i bhr'um yig dkar po bltas
T02D3601:226b-21: bsams nas / la / de yongs su gyur pa
T02D3601:226b-22: las gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma mchod rten gyi
T02D3601:226b-23: drung du bzhugs pa sku mdog dkar mo zhal gsum
T02D3601:226b-26: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3601:226b-27: sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la rdo rje skyil krung bcings nas bzhugs pa /
T02D3601:226b-31: mche bas ma mchu mnan pa /
T02D3601:226b-32: g-yas kyi phyag bzhi rnams su sna tshogs rdo rje dang ;
T02D3601:226b-33: chu skyes dmar po'i steng na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba 'od dpag med pa dang /
T02D3601:226b-34: mda' dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya rnams so //
T02D3601:226b-35: g-yon gyi phyag bzhi rnams su gzhu dang /
T02D3601:226b-36: sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang /
T02D3601:226b-37: mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D3601:226b-38: bum pa bzang po rnams so //
T02D3601:226b-39: rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan cing lha'i na bza'i stod g-yogs mnabs pa /
T02D3601:226b-40: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D3601:226b-41: 'od zer dkar po'i phreng ba can du blta bar bya'o //
T02D3601:227a-0: de'i g-yas phyogs su 'jig rten dbang phyug sku mdog dkar po g-yon na @227a * //
T02D3601:227a-2: phyag g-yas na rnga yab bsnams pa'o //
T02D3601:227a-3: g-yon phyogs su phyag na rdo rje sku mdog autpa
T02D3601:227a-4: la sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu phyag g-yon na
T02D3601:227a-5: autpa la la gnas pa'i rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D3601:227a-6: phyag g-yas na rnga yab bsnams pa de dag bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D3601:227a-10: byang phyogs rnams su mi g-yo ba dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang /
T02D3601:227a-12: stobs po che rnams thams cad sku mdog sngon po phyag gnyis pa /
T02D3601:227a-15: zhabs g-yon brkyang ba'i stag gi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs pa /
T02D3601:227a-16: dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3601:227a-18: sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la bzhugs pa /
T02D3601:227a-19: phyag g-yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02D3601:227a-20: phyag g-yas pa rnams su ral gri dang /
T02D3601:227a-23: rdo rje bsnams pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3601:227a-24: steng gi phyogs su gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i
T02D3601:227a-25: bu bdud rtsis bkang ba'i bum pa bsnams shing bdud
T02D3601:227a-26: rtsi'i rgyun 'bab bzhin pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D3601:227a-27: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'khor dang bcas pa bsam zhing dgod par bya'o //
T02D3601:227a-28: aom yig ni spyi bor ro //
T02D3601:227a-30: h'um yig ni snying gar ro //
T02D3601:227a-31: tr'am yig ni dpral ba la'o //
T02D3601:227a-34: de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D3601:227a-35: thal mo yang dag par sbyar nas mdzub mo bkug
T02D3601:227a-36: nas mtheb chen dag dang sbyar ba legs par sbyin
T02D3601:227a-37: par mdzad nas / aom yig gsum dang bcas pa'i
T02D3601:227a-38: gzungs lan cig bzlas nas phyi nas 'dul ba'i phyag
T02D3601:227a-40: aom bhr'um sv'a h'a snying po'i sngags so //
T02D3601:227a-41: aom aa mi ta a'a yurda de sv'a h'a /
T02D3601:227a-42: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so //
T02D3601:227a-43: aom aa mi te aa me tod bha be aa
T02D3601:227a-44: me ta bi kr'an te aa mi ta ga te
T02D3601:227a-45: aa mi te g'a mi ni aa mi t'a yurda
T02D3601:227a-46: de ga gan k'irti ka re sarba kle sha ksha
T02D3601:227a-47: yam ka ri yee sv'a h'a /
T02D3601:227a-48: zhes pa ni phreng ba'i sngags so //
